projects.title: CARSpy
projects.summary: A python module for synthesizing and fitting experimental coherent anti-Stokes Raman (CARS) spectra.
highlights: Comprehensive physical models: G-matrix, Expoential Gap Model, Voigt line profiles, T-K convolution
Extendable for various species and CARS configurations

projects.title: MRPOD
projects.summary: A python module for Multiresolution Proper Orthogonal Decomposition (MRPOD) of multidimensional image time series.
highlights: Principle Component Analysis (PCA) in well-defined frequency domain

projects.title: PyLAT
projects.summary: A python module for tomographic reconstruction of 1-D two-color laser absorption with irregularly arranged diode lasers.
highlights: Classical reconstruction methods (e.g.  ART, SIRT, Landweber)

projects.title: Pythonize
projects.summary: A blog and knowledge base for data crunching and visualization in Python.
highlights: Tutorial-style blog posts based on executable Jupyter Notebooks
Central topics include laser spectroscopy, fluid dynamics, machine learning and finance
Highspeed laser diagnostics for the quantification of temperature, velocity and species concentrations in next-gen combustion systems
Image data processing and feature extraction based on machine learning
Project subtask lead: "Soot Processes and Radiation in Aeronautical Innovative Combustion (SOPRANO)" (EU2020, Grant Agreement No.690724)
Principle Investigator: "Understanding the turbulent flame dynamics of jet-stabilized gas turbine combustors" (Helmholtz Postdoc Fellowship, Grant PD-112)
